title: "Samsung Electronics develops EUV-5nm chip production line"
excerpt: "Samsung Electronics plans to build a production line for the newer EUV 5nm chip in Pyeongtaek, Korea, and start pumping out them out by next year. The Extreme Ultraviolet-based 5 nanometer (EUV-5nm) is a new method for building the microarchitecture of a chip."
